recipesJson.name: Cereally Easy Crunchies
recipesJson.author: SkiddlzNinja
recipesJson.description: A simple take on a staple flavor.

reviews.text: This is a great and very very simple recipe that any beginner should mix if they enjoy cereal liquids. I know it may look boring, but it absolutely captures an easy cereal profile like Skiddlz intended. I prefer this recipe over the fruit loops recipe.
